scripts.deploy-arbg: graph deploy marlinprotocol/enclaves-arb-goerli subgraph-arbg.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
scripts.deploy-arbg-preview: graph deploy marlin-staging/enclaves-preview subgraph-arbg-preview.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
scripts.deploy-arbsep: graph deploy marlinprotocol/oyster-arbitrum-sepolia subgraph-arbsep.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
scripts.deploy-linea: graph deploy marlinprotocol/oyster-linea subgraph-linea.yaml --ipfs https://graph-ipfs.linea.build --node https://graph-deploy.linea.build --version-label
scripts.deploy-linea-goerli: graph deploy marlinprotocol/oyster-linea-goerli subgraph-linea-goerli.yaml --ipfs https://graph-ipfs.goerli.linea.build --node https://graph-deploy.goerli.linea.build --version-label
